Package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.Commands.CommandList.CardPhaseCommands

package it.polimi.ingsw.is25am22new.Client.Commands.CommandList.CardPhaseCommands
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AcceptCreditsCommand
    The AcceptCreditsCommand class implements a specific command for accepting credits during the game's card phase.
    ActivateDoubleCannonCommand
    ActivateDoubleCannonCommand is a command object that allows a player to activate a double cannon on their shipboard.
    ActivateDoubleEngineCommand
    Represents a concrete command that activates a double-engine component on the player's shipboard.
    ActivateShieldCommand
    The ActivateShieldCommand class represents a specific command in the game that allows a player to activate a shield generator on their shipboard during the appropriate game phase.
    ChooseShipWreckCommand
    ChooseShipWreckCommand represents a specific command that allows a player to interact with shipwreck components during certain game phases.
    DecideToRemoveCrewMembersCommand
    The DecideToRemoveCrewMembersCommand class represents a specific command in the game that allows the current player to decide whether to remove crew members from their ship during the "Abandoned Ship" card phase.
    GetBlockCommand
    The GetBlockCommand class represents a specific command in the game allowing the current player to retrieve a GoodBlock from the active card and place it onto a specified position in their shipboard.
    LandOnAbandonedStationCommand
    The LandOnAbandonedStationCommand class represents the command executed when a player decides to land on an Abandoned Station during the relevant game phase.
    LandOnPlanetCommand
    The LandOnPlanetCommand class represents the command for a player to land on a planet during the "CARD" phase of the game.
    ManageGoodBlocksCommand
    ManageGoodBlocksCommand is a command implementation that facilitates handling specific card states within the game when the player interacts with "SmugglersState_3" or "AbandonedStationState_2".
    MoveGoodBlockCommand
    The MoveGoodBlockCommand class is responsible for handling the game command that moves a good block from one location on the shipboard to another.
    PickCardCommand
    The PickCardCommand class represents a command that allows the current player to pick a card during the appropriate game phase.
    RemoveCrewMemberCommand
    The RemoveCrewMemberCommand class is responsible for handling the removal of a crew member from a specified location on a player's shipboard during the game.
    RemoveGoodBlockCommand
    The RemoveGoodBlockCommand is a specific implementation of AbstractCommand that facilitates the removal of a good block from a particular location on the player's shipboard.
    ResolveEffectCommand
    The ResolveEffectCommand class represents a concrete implementation of the AbstractCommand that executes the logic to resolve effects of a specific game card.
    SwitchGoodBlocksCommand
    The SwitchGoodBlocksCommand class implements a command that allows players to switch `GoodBlock` items between storage compartments on their shipboard.
